resources.string: You are a local. All players except a spy know this location. Ask your friends different questions to figure out which one of them is a spy
Try to figure out what location the locals are talking about
Start asking questions! Find a Spy before the time runs out, otherwise he will win
You cannot select an empty set
Swipe and we will tell you what to do
In the game, you are either a local or a Spy. Only locals know the location and they must find the Spy, while the spy must guess the game location
You can ask questions about the game location. The responding player will be the next to ask the question. The player who was a Spy in the last game is the first to ask a question
Listen carefully to the answers and questions of other players. Remember, the Spy does not know the location, which is why he may act incorrectly
Say: “I found the Spy” and say his/her Name. After that a vote is taken. All players vote on whether the named player is a Spy

If all players agree, the player selected by the vote shows his card. If he turns out to be a local, then the Spy wins. If this person is really a Spy, the locals win. If not all players agree, then the game continues. If the Spy guessed about the discussed location, then he can name it. If the Spy guessed it, then he wins. Otherwise, he will be defeated.
Don`t forget about the time. It`s limited, so hurry up. When the time is up, the Spy wins
First, select the conditions of the game: a set of words, the time of the game, the number of players and spies and the game language.
There are two roles in the game: a local and a spy. For everyone to know their roles, pass the phone to each player in turn.
Won’t the other players see my role?

When you click on the card, it will turn over. On the reverse side, you will either find out the location, or be glad to know that you are the Spy. After another click, your card will hide and you will see the cover of the next card. Then pass the phone to the next player, so that he turned over his card. When everyone knows their roles, start the game. Ask each other questions about the place that was on the cards of the locals, for example: “What color is this place?”, “How often do you go there?”, “Do you want to return to this place?”. The main task of the locals is to find the Spy (or Spies), he has no idea what place you are talking about. The Spy`s job is to pretend he is local and knows the game location. He has to try to guess what location the players are at.
What if you guess who the Spy is?

Say: “I found the Spy” and say his/her Name. After that a vote is taken. All players vote on whether the named player is a Spy. If all players agree, the player selected by the vote shows his card. If he turns out to be a local, then the Spy wins. If this person is really a Spy, the locals win. If not all players agree, then the game continues. You can also play without voting, instead, all players on the count of 3 must point to the player who, in their opinion, is a Spy. Если все выбрали одного и того же игрока, то он должен раскрыть свою роль.Если я Шпион и догадался локацию, что мне делать? Просто скажи: “Я знаю локацию” и назви её. Если ты угадаешь, то выиграешь. Ошибаешься - выиграют местные
If the locals managed to expose the Spy before he sounded timer, then they will win. If the Spy could last all this time - he wins.
How do I play Multi-Spy Mode?

The number of Spies should always be less than the number local. Each Spy plays for himself, because only one wins. To win, the locals must now expose all the spies. If a since they do not expose everyone, then it is precisely those Spies who are not exposed. In the case when all players vote against the person who Consider a Spy: if he turns out to be local, the Spies win. If the locals guess right, the exposed Spy leaves the game, and the game itself continues, because you need to figure out all the spies. When when one of the Spies calls the location: If he guesses, the game ends and this Spy wins. If he calls the wrong place - the game continues without him. Cards fall out completely by chance, so your role only depends on your luck!
Find out who the spy is
